amendment.description: Amendment requires that NEXRAD radar sites operated by the Department of Defense function as fully committed elements of the national weather radar network.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 28 in the Congressional Record of October 11, 1995, to direct the Defense Department, in conjuction with NOAA, to ensure that NEXRAD radar sites operated by the Department of Defense function as fully committed elements of the national weather radar network.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
